website_summaries.verdict: Those with arthritis or similar ailments will appreciate the ease with which this grater can be operated and cleaned.
pros: Easy to break apart for cleaning, and dishwasher safe
Grating is a breeze with the smooth-turning handle
For both left and right-handed users
Particularly effective with hard cheeses such as Parmesan
cons: Does not ship with a slicer blade
Some found the hopper to be on the small side

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS DEFINITELY THE ONE TO BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two previous rotary graters and was terribly disappointed. I returned one but got so aggravated that I threw that all metal thing in the trash. This one, however, is awesome, and I absolutely love it. The handle turns smoothly. The cheese grates with little resistance, and then you just throw it in the dishwasher for the quickest clean-up ever. Seriously, it cannot get any easier than that, and I would recommend to everyone that this is definitely the cheese grater to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Chaney

customer_reviews.title: No more grated knuckles
customer_reviews.text: YES! this gadget is awesome. It grates cheese with ease, cleaning is a breeze. (Sorry, had to go with the rhyme) It really is easy to take apart and clean or replace insert. Grate the cheese right into your bowl, it doesn't go all over the place like old graters. Left hand/right hand is a plus, my lefty son doesn't have to adjust. (did I just rhyme again?) It did not work for fresh ginger, and wasn't suitable for almonds or onions. Oh well, I tried. Never mind, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol McKee

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Pretty flimsy build quality. The handle that you hold to turn the rotary mechanism slips off easily This isn't too bad because you can just slip it back on, but it is annoying. The real problem is with another part of the rotary mechanism. The way the metal blade attaches to the plastic is not built to last. First pieces of the plastic started to break off (yes, into the grated food), then, finally, the metal blade detached completely from the handle and it is now unusable and in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Kuhl

customer_reviews.title: Really cool and quick to use.  Expect bad cholesterol to rise
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this product. Exactly like the restaurants. I had a hand grater which worked fine but this is way faster. Even does the softer cheeses like mozzarella, but really excellent with the harder ones like parm and Asiago. I recommend this product. In fact it works so well that it’s rather sobering to see how much cheese I really eat. I would never think of eating a block of cheese yet the grater works so well that it grinds so effortlessly you have to realize that a block of cheese or a grated one is the same and then accept the fact that you are a fat ass now.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cheese grater
customer_reviews.text: After a long search involving several unhappy purchases, we have finally found a replacement for our no longer manufactured cheese grater. This grater is easy to turn; can be used left or right-handed; seems sturdy even on an aged parm; and washes beautifully in the dishwasher. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Design is aesthetically pleasing, easy to assemble and clean, but awful to actually use. There is no way to grip the handle to get the leverage needed to turn the crank for medium to harder cheeses. The only way to grasp the handle with any strength requires your thumb to get in the way of the crank. Difficult to use and poorly designed. Have been trying to adapt to it for a month or so but will be chucking it and buying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this waste-of-money-and-time! This is junky plastic, terrible blades, clunky to hold, awful product.
customer_reviews.author: Runalongbuddy

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I like this grater. Being a guy it would have been a touch better if it the handle and crank were slightly larger. Of course a larger tool would take more drawer space. It cuts parmigiana easily. It does not cross cut so I did have to chop it fine with a knife afterwards to put it in a strained shaker. Would be great as is for cooking or spooning out. Beats the heck out of the tin plated 4 sided grater that was all I ever used before. Jay
customer_reviews.author: Marie or Jay

customer_reviews.title: the grater is not well designed
customer_reviews.text: the grater 'wheels" the shreder part is built so that the the the way they made it are made so that the wide seams in the gratets are opposite of the turn of the grater. In other words the seam in the grater has a large gap and leaves chuncks of cheese un shredded. The seam is where they fastened the metal cylinder grate. It is bacically backwards of the rotation of the hand crank. Would not buy again. Poor design on the grater inserts. Used it for about 3 months and threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Ellis

customer_reviews.title: IKEA , a name brand I know.
customer_reviews.text: Out of all that is listed on Amazon I figured that an IKEA brand I know. I've used it on cheeses and it works well but I was looking for grader that will do very fine on the cheese, but what it does is good for us. My concern is that changing the grading wheel the plastic ring that you have to tighten may break after uses. Overall two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice little grater for cheese or other soft foods.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would use this hand grater a lot, but I don't. I had an old one years ago that I "inherited" from my mom. I gave it away a long time ago, too. This one can go in the dishwasher, which is a nice feature, and it comes with different sized grater cylinders. I think if I would make myself use it, it would be fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mumzie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this grater for probably five years and it's as good as the day I first bought it. Just like they use in the restaurants. I use this tool a t least twice a week and it's nice to have the two options for the fine or larger grated cheese. I always hand wash it and attach the circular piece to one of the grater pieces so it doesn't get misplaced.
customer_reviews.author: peggy oneill

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE in the kitchen!!! Easy to use, easy to clean. MUCH better than a conventional cheese grater.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product! I will never go back to a regular cheese grater again. With a regular cheese grater, you have to worry about the very end of the cheese... will you grate it or cut your fingers off? lol. This one gets rid of that issue, and its wayyyyy easier on the hands. Minimal work and maximum grating. I also love that it has two different size options, and it's very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Customers

customer_reviews.title: Wipes the floor with my Mouli
customer_reviews.text: Had a stainless steel version that kept grating steel into my cheese so I thought I'd try this. Works great. Decent capacity. No shards of plastic or steal in my cheese. Definitely recommend. Use the larger greater for softer cheeses
customer_reviews.author: BDM

customer_reviews.title: Handle cracking after 3 uses.
customer_reviews.text: This cheese grater works well, but I have only used it 3 times and the handle is already starting to crack.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Leonetti

customer_reviews.title: Easy, efficient, and dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: With tendonitis in one arm and bursitis in the other, plus arthritis in both hands, grating has been a big hassle for a long time. As with all Ikea products, this one has no instructions, so it's a good thing it's easy to figure out. Now I don't have to ask other people to do my grating, I don't have to pay extra for already-grated food, and I haven't included a single bit of fingernail in my recipes since I bought this. Oh, and the best part? The whole thing goes in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: CritiCal

customer_reviews.title: This has been my most favorite cheese grater of all time
customer_reviews.text: This has been my most favorite cheese grater of all time. Growing up, grating cheese was always my chore and I hated it. We always had the flat graters or worse, the square one. It took FOREVER to grate a cup of cheese with those. With this one, you cube your cheese, toss it in and turn the crank and you've got grated cheese. This has held up for over two years with lots and lots of dishwasher cleanings and moves. It still works great and cleans great in the dishwasher which is a must in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job on semi-hard cheeses
customer_reviews.text: If it were a light sturdier, it would be a five star product. Looks good, work good. However, a really hard cheese will deform the grating wheel and then some of cheese does not grate.
customer_reviews.author: delores n schuler

customer_reviews.title: Works well for topping dishes with Parmesan
customer_reviews.text: Works well for hard cheeses (like Parmesan), but you will get a chunk of cheese paste plastered to the wheel when you're done. You also have to cut small chunks for them to fit in the grater. Don't plan on grating a large amount of cheese, as your hand will cramp pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dallin

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This cheese grater works well. It is easier to use than others we have tried. My wife gave up on others because they were not a good ergonomic fit. She is happy with this one though.
customer_reviews.author: From Western NY

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use grater. You won't hurt your fingers while grating. Difficult to clean though. I liked the this product overall and am happy with it though.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine71

customer_reviews.title: Great grater
customer_reviews.text: I had several hand held graters, but this one was wonderful. The blades were sharp and made the process of grating Parmesan and Romano cheeses so much easier! Would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: LL Thorn Bird

customer_reviews.title: Need to change my 5 star rating to 1 star due to the cracks
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 other rotary graters that failed after a couple uses this one how ever is fantastic it's sturdy easy to use and easy to clean great item would highly recommend this grater. I need to update my review of this product after just a few months of minimal use I'm getting cracks in the handle and body of the grater
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite useful!
customer_reviews.text: I have been quite pleased with the grater. Most of the cheeses I have grated with it have come out exactly as I would have expected. It is nice to be able to switch it easily from left-handed to right-handed (I'm good with both hands, so nice to be able to switch if one hand gets tired). My only complaint is that I wish the slot that place the cheese in would be slightly better. I usually have to cut down the blocks of cheese I typically buy because they are too wide for it. But that is a minor detail.
customer_reviews.author: DL Kamstra

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't broken yet and we grate a TON of cheese. Easy to take apart and put back together. Dishwasher safe. I put it in the top rack.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique B

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and is perfect for my need - grinding Parmesan for Italian dishes. Especially nice for the final presentation when adding a few twists of the grater.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Q

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grater to replace a different brand that had broken. This grater seems to be much sturdier than others. One plus is that it is more ergonomically​ designed than the last one I had, much easier on your hands when grating cheeses. Very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: TechBob

customer_reviews.title: Love that cheese
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats fresh grated cheese and this little gadget does a pretty good job. You do have to cut pieces of cheese fairly small to fit tne grater but not much problem to cut up and just keep loading it until you have all you need grated. Using both hands is a plus if you are grating a lot of cheese. Fairly easy clean up too. This is the first grater I have tried, but if you like the "real thing", it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: thatsme

customer_reviews.title: The product itself works great. My only complaint is that there were no ...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself works great. My only complaint is that there were no instructions at all, and all of the paperwork was in another language. Luckily it was easily to figure out on my own, but I can see how it may be challenging for some. They should really fix that!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth stovall

customer_reviews.title: Has held up well, good quality, may be awkward for smaller hands
customer_reviews.text: This works well enough but I’m not totally in love with it. It kind of hurts my hands and is awkward to use, but that just could be due to my size - who knows. It works well, though, just not super easy for me
customer_reviews.author: ccc1184

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So glad we got this little gem. I cook a lot & use fresh Parmesan, this makes it easy
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe we grated parm any other way. This is unbelievably easy and fun to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This allowed me to stop buying pre-shredded cheese from the grocery store. The blocks go farther and taste way better (not covered in tree cellulose). The product works great and is easy to clean. Probably shredded 30 blocks since buying and it still works great. Mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, pepper jack all are no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really great for everyone to get the amount of fresh cheese they want and grades finely.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Finally we found a cheese grater that works! After trying numerous cheese graters that either cut y fingers, grated the cheese too fine or just did not work well, finally my husband stumbled upon this gem. It works like a charm and you can take it apart easily and put it right in the dishwasher for easy cleaning. It has different attachments for fine or course cheese. I have not tried it yet on anything but cheese but I am sure it works just as well on that. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: L Bullerwell

customer_reviews.title: Works great on soap too
customer_reviews.text: I cannot speak to how well this grater works on cheese, or other foods, I purchased it to grate castille soap to make laundry detergent. I wanted something a little easier than the flat grater I had been using. The rotary grater is a little easier on me than running the soap along my flat grater was. It works great grating castille soap, no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Works well and no shredded plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Aupapillon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality. Built well. Easy to use easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Waters

customer_reviews.title: Good kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Do love using this grater. It concerns me there is a white ring you screw on after inserting grater size to secure it in place. It can easily get misplaced with other dishes after washing if some else not familiar with the tool is putting it away. Excellent otherwise. Also, my other grater had three different sizes to grate the cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grater
customer_reviews.text: Once we found our that shredded cheese is often coated with something when you buy it at the grocery store we bought this. We liked it so much that at Christmas we put one of these in each of our adult children's Christmas stocking. We use ours multiple times a week...put it in the dishwasher and it has held up great!
customer_reviews.author: Connor Walters

customer_reviews.title: We love this grater
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and well packaged. We love this grater, which does not scratch your knuckles and uses all of the cheese. Two sizes give more options. We like the notion of not having to use pre-grated, packaged cheeses, which include additives. So, in addition to being convenient and easy to use, this offers us increased healthy eating options.
customer_reviews.author: CynD-S

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Great cheese grinder, a bit flimsy but does the job. I'm glad I got it, it makes cheese look beautiful on spaghettis
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Pantaleon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent...
customer_reviews.text: good product easy and practical I highly recommend it thanks ...
customer_reviews.author: Jesus sosa

customer_reviews.title: The three pieces that it breaks into are annoying to clean and there's usually a thin sliver of ...
customer_reviews.text: It's alright for occasional use. The three pieces that it breaks into are annoying to clean and there's usually a thin sliver of whatever you're grating stuck between the barrel and the body. It doesn't handle carrots/vegetables well, either, like a juicer more than a grater. It hasn't messed anything up royally though, so it's not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Eccleston

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to use than the other kind of grater which grates your knuckles!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Very good grater.
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a gift. The recipient is thoroughly happy with the grater.
customer_reviews.author: C.M. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the 2 different grating blades that come with the product. I can choose whether I want my cheese course or finely ground. It also works with carrots!! Use it to make a carrot cake recently. Unfortunately, my husband and/or son misplaced the plastic end-cap screw thingie, so now I can't use it!!!! But, for the short time I WAS able to use the product, it was awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Charity L. High

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: The device comes apart so it can be cleaned throughly in the dishwasher. The grating crank motion is smooth and the cheese falls out easily, loose and fluffy!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Luttrell

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased this on April 2014 and the it worked great until now
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on April 2014 and the it worked great until now. The notches the ring attach to to keep the grater (metal) part in the housing have slowly broken. Disappointed - poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just what we need to quickly grate cheese or chocolate
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: It cuts my cheese!
customer_reviews.text: This grater is great for cheese... But don't expect to do much else. Hard cheeses- no problem. Soft cheeses- no problem (and delicious). Carrots- no good. The inside stained, and it did cut a strip out of the plastic- probably my fault, but I was disappointed that I couldn't quickly grate carrots. Because of this I don't plan on using this for anything but cheese. I probably should eat more cheese anyway. Easy to clean- pop it in the dishwasher. Easy to assemble- helps me get cheese on my food quicker. Overall... I am happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Preston S.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a new grater I searched the reviews and decided on this product. Otis sturdy, cleans and assemblies well, seems rugged. So far performs well.we really like this grater.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: way handy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!! so much easier than trying to grate cheese on a square grater. works well for hard and softer (not blue) cheeses and goes in the dishwasher. would like it if it felt a little sturdier, but its great sofar!
customer_reviews.author: JTS

customer_reviews.title: This one is AWESOME!!!!! don't pass up
customer_reviews.text: I love this cheese and food grater. It's so easy to use but more over a breeze to clean. It does on excellent job of hard as well as semi-hard cheeses. I absolutely love it and count it as my top favorite kitchen gadget for 2014. Will highly recommend to friends and even buy for them.
customer_reviews.author: Garysgal888

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to be working. I will wait to see how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: Debra T.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works for me! Just what I needed to shred all kinds of cheese. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as hoped
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this simple grater which we use for parmesan & other hard cheeses. Came with 2 different size rotary blades. Seems like it should last better than our previous one, a KitchenAid Gourmet Rotary Grater, where the stress on the plastic screw resulted in it breaking.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Who knew they figured out the best way to grate cheese
customer_reviews.text: After destroying yet another cheap rotary grinder, I bit the bullet and went Swedish. Who knew they figured out the best way to grate cheese. I love that the grater locks into the body, preventing the assembly from falling apart when you set it down. Comes apart easily for cleaning, this product is great!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sensale

customer_reviews.title: This style is much better than the old 'box' cheese grater
customer_reviews.text: This style is much better than the old 'box' cheese grater. Save your hands. Cleanup is actually easier too since the grater insert can be removed.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: More sturdy than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This grater is GREAT! Easy to use, dishwasher safe and stronger than the one I bought it to replace. My old plastic grater was kinda flimsy, but it lasted for almost nine years; I expect much better from this one. Can't beat it for the price, ease of use and easy cleaup.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item for the ease and ability to have fresh grated cheese on our food. Used the item twice and the drum where blades are developed a crack. We are disappointed in the stability of the product but liked the fresh cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I use this quite a bit for shredding cheese - it makes it fun for a kid to do the cheese shredding, too! Nice, easy tool to use, easy to clean, not a pain to store. I probably use it once or twice a week, much easier than a box grater.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: A great alternative to pampered chef
customer_reviews.text: My mother owns the pampered chef version of this tool. It is really nice and does a great job, but so does this item. I've been very happy with the function of this tool at a fraction of the price of the expensive alternatives. Not much else to say. I grates cheese very well. I would gladly purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: righton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much faster with less effort than the one I bought from Olive Garden.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: cheese grater
customer_reviews.text: I like this cheese grater. It reminds me of what they use at Olive Garden. My only problem with it was trying to figure out how to put the blade in at first. It works well though.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Schroth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, easy to use. Will update with a long term review after three months.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: It has a fine grade I was hoping for a thicker grade. It's a ok product but I would spend a little more and get something better but it is a ok product.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Barry

customer_reviews.title: Nice little Grater
customer_reviews.text: We love this this little grater! It has interchangeable grates, is easy to take apart and put back together, easy to wash and clean! The only thing that would be better is a larger one! Recommended. It's worth the extra money for the ease of use and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: CoCoPuff

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Tool
customer_reviews.text: This makes grating Parmesan cheese a breeze. Clean up is quick and easy. Disassembly and a simple.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Camella

customer_reviews.title: A decent alternative to a box grater
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar one awhile ago and decided I needed it back in my life. I love using this grater.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica O

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. I am left-handed and reversing the handle is a snap. I purchased a different greater a few months back which was terrible to use and almost impossible to disassemble for cleaning. i looked at My IKEA story for this device, but they did not stock it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: alexra denver

customer_reviews.title: I love this grater
customer_reviews.text: I love this grater! It is easy to use and easy to clean. I have had it for over 6 months now and still love it. I took advice from another reviewer and store it in a big ziplock bag with my cheese (in the fridge) - it is so convenient!
customer_reviews.author: B.W.

customer_reviews.title: this cheese grater is just perfect! It's not large so you cannot do huge ...
customer_reviews.text: For our family, this cheese grater is just perfect! It's not large so you cannot do huge chunks of cheese at a time but it grates well and to clean it we just stick in the dishwasher and it comes out beautifully. Have given several as wedding gifts.
customer_reviews.author: A. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great grater!
customer_reviews.text: Molto Bene! This works very well and I have large hands and no problems with this. It is very easy to clean too. I cut the cheese into small cubes and go to work. It's fast and the end result is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Regular Dad

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Great item And I can tell you, I was addicted to my French moulinex grater And this one is resistant with excellent proportion and does a great job without any fear for your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Grate
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it on spaghetti night, it goes right in the dishwasher with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy James

customer_reviews.title: Say Cheese!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed! I had a similar item many years ago, but gave it away when I gave up eating cheese (for health reasons). I am now able to eat cheese again, and have yearned for a cheese grater. This one is oh so easy to use and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Icelandia

customer_reviews.title: Best rotary cheese grinder I've owned
customer_reviews.text: This grinder is one the best rotary cheese grinders I've owned. It comes apart well for very easy and thorough cleaning and the drum is reversible for lefties. I grate a lot of parmesan and this has held up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: ErikR

customer_reviews.title: Best way to grate cheese.
customer_reviews.text: Well made for getting the most out of a piece of cheese for grating. Even better than the mouli I had 40 years ago. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean R.

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: When I break this one I'll buy another, we like it!
customer_reviews.author: KWP

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! It grates the cheese well. It comes apart easily making it easy to clean. The fact that it can be adjusted for right hand or left hand use is awesome as my wife is a lefty and I'm a righty.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. We have been using with no problems. Easy to take it apart and wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Lima

customer_reviews.title: Great Grater
customer_reviews.text: Very handy, especially for Parmesan... Easy to clean (I just take it apart and pop in dishwasher.) Quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Thinking

customer_reviews.title: Is a good gadget, well made and should last a long ...
customer_reviews.text: Is a good gadget, well made and should last a long time. Can only handle small chunks of cheese. I use it to grate cheese on top of the food at the table, not to grate large amounts of cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Rider

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very, very easy to use. I bought this to shred laundry soap for homemade detergent. I have tried various ways of grating the soap and this is definitely the easiest. No pain in my wrist after grating and is pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: JakeNLeelo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I bought this because the handle broke on my old greater. The IKEA is much stronger built. Also, The grater comes out very easily for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia W

customer_reviews.title: Best grater
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 different graters, trying to find one that doesn't come apart when I'm grating cheese & this one doesn't!! The only one I've found like it...worth every penny! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Niners

customer_reviews.title: Rotary cheese grater
customer_reviews.text: I used this item as soon as I rec'd. it for a recipe I needed for grated swiss cheese. I have used it for mozzarella also and it is easy and the cheese comes out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Grater
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, handy and easy to use. Love the 2 different sizes too.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Tallerino

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact it come w/two different size graters Is so easy. Love ❤️ love love it
customer_reviews.author: susan lake

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well. Easy to take apart
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Easy to take apart, and does well in my dishwasher which is NOT heated drying. A little odd to store. Nice that it can be righty or lefty.
customer_reviews.author: 1365Mike

customer_reviews.title: Left and Right Handed
customer_reviews.text: This is very good! All the parts separate for better cleaning. They go back together easily and secure. The two shred sizes cover most everything I need it for. And it works well for me and my left handed mate.
customer_reviews.author: Cate Martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grater for fast and easy work.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Love that it comes apart for easy cleaning and love the two grating sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly

customer_reviews.title: Left hand and right handed!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, even for lefties. A kitchen tool for right minded people!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Heitzenroeder

customer_reviews.title: Great little grater!
customer_reviews.text: I use this grater to grate soap for homemade laundry detergent. It is so much easier than the regular flat grater, and it takes so much less time! It's also easy to clean. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie M

customer_reviews.title: NOT DISHWASHER SAFE
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but it melted in the dishwasher. I used it for a while while it was broken and it was good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Rhee

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!! It needs only one thing added
customer_reviews.text: The BEST !! It needs only one thing added.. a 'rubber' cover for the 'knob' to help with grip and more comfort while you turn for grating :)
customer_reviews.author: MLC

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only a few uses!
customer_reviews.text: Like a typical plastic rotary grater, this one broke after only a few uses. My advice is to stay away from this Ikea grater and choose a stainless one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This shreds cheese with ease. Also used to shred potatoes with ease. Have been using it for about three months without issue
customer_reviews.author: phe4321

customer_reviews.title: It's from IKEA. So it works!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Works well on hard or semi soft cheeses.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moushey

product_meta.title: Ikea Stralande rotary grater, white
product_meta.description: Grates the food coarsely or finely depending on which insert is used. Designed for use by both right and left handed people. The insert can be removed for easier cleaning. Dishwasher-safe
feature_bullets: Grates the food coarsely or finely depending on which insert is used.
Designed for use by both right and left handed people.
The insert can be removed for easier cleaning.
